channel.title: PATH on Pen-y-Fan
channel.description: Recent content in PATH on Pen-y-Fan

item.title: How to set up Laragon on a new Windows computer (part 6) - Add to path
item.description: Laragon’s terminal is cmder, which will automatically give command line access to all the tools in Laragon’s development environment. If other terminals are required then Laragon can add the development tools to the Windows user environment path.
